long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert CO2 values on web pages into statistics. 
1 - Highlight a figure, right-click, and select "Convert".
2 - A popup will help you understand its environmental impact in relatable scales, such as the yearly emissions of an average household or an entire city. 

This straightforward extension makes it easy to grasp the significance of CO2 figures, helping you visualize their real-world implications in terms everyone can understand.
